      • movePlayer

        public boolean movePlayer(Player player,
                          int x,
                          int y)
        Moves the specified player to he specified co-ordinates Players cannot move to a wall and cannot move outside of the board.
        Parameters:
        player - - the player moving
        x - - x co-ordinate to move too
        y - - y x co-ordinate to move too
        Returns:
        - if the move was valid

        Parameters:

        x - - the x co- ordinate on the board
        y - - the y co-ordinate on the board
        Returns:
        - if the weapon was moved or not
